FrameLogger Class Reference

This class records per-frame statistics and writes them to a log file. More...

#include <frame_logger.hpp>

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

static void init ()

Detailed Description

This class records per-frame statistics and writes them to a log file.

It can be activated and customised through the Debug/FrameLogger watchers.
